column4: that's true. A lot of the stuff always seems to be in the wrong place, so it makes for an annoying learning curve, but it does grow on you. >.>
yes, and now that I'm past that curve, I struggle when I'm back in Photoshop!  Sigh.
I've heard it said that once you learn it, you can switch back and forth between Dvorak and regular keyboards.  But I haven't had the guts...
